instructions: In the Photos app on your Mac, click a shared album under Shared in the sidebar. Click the Collaborate button in the toolbar. Do any of the following: Allow subscribers to post their own photos and videos to the album: Select Subscribers Can Post. Allow people who don t have a Mac, iPhone or iPad to view the album: Select Public Website. Anyone with the website URL can view and download the shared album s contents. See a notification whenever a subscriber makes changes to a shared album: Select Notifications. Note: Subscribers who view your shared album on the web can t comment on the items in it or view new comments posted by you or others. To make comments visible to someone without a Mac, iPhone or iPad, post the comments before you invite the person to view the shared album. Click the Collaborate button in the toolbar again.
